verses.english: Woe to those who give less [than due],
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata ga mãsu naƙƙasãwa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.english: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke idan suka auna daga mutãne suna cika mũdu.

verses.english: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sun auna musu da zakka ko da sikẽli, suna ragẽwa

verses.english: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
verses.hausa: Ashe! Waɗancan bã su tabbata cẽwa lalle sũ, ana tãyar da su ba?

verses.english: For a tremendous Day -
verses.hausa: Domin yini mai girma.

verses.english: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
verses.hausa: Yinin da mutãne ke tãshi zuwa ga Ubangijin halitta?

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
verses.english: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
verses.hausa: Haƙĩƙa lalle ne littãfin fãjirai dãhir, yana a cikin Sijjĩn.

verses.english: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
verses.hausa: Kuma, mẽ ya sanar da kai abin da akẽ cẽ wa Sijjĩn?

verses.english: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
verses.hausa: Wani 1ittãfi ne rubũtacce.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
verses.hausa: Bone yã tabbata a rãnar nan ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa.

verses.english: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke ƙaryatãwa game da rãnar sakamako.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.english: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
verses.hausa: Babũ mai ƙaryatãwa gare shi fãce dukan mai ƙẽtare haddi mai yawan zunubi.

verses.arabic: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
verses.hausa: Idan ana karãtun ãyõyinmu, a kansa, sai ya ce: tãtsũniyõyin mutãnen farko ne.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.english: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
verses.hausa: A'aha! Bã haka ba, abin da suka kasance suna aikatãwa dai, yã yi tsãtsa a cikin zukãtãnsu.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.english: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
verses.hausa: A'aha! Haƙĩƙa, lalle ne sũ daga Ubangijinsu, rãnar nan, waɗanda ake shãmakancẽwa ne.

verses.english: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, lalle ne, sũ mãsu shiga cikin Jahĩm ne.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan a ce: "Wannan shi ne abin da kuka kasance kuna ƙaryatãwa game da shi."

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.english: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
verses.hausa: A'aha! Haƙĩƙa lalle ne littãfin mãsu ɗã'ã yana a cikin Illiyyĩna?

verses.english: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
verses.hausa: Kuma mẽne ne yã sanar da kai abin da ake cẽwa Illiyyũna?

verses.english: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
verses.hausa: Wani littãfi ne rubũtacce.

verses.english: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
verses.hausa: Muƙarrabai suke halarta shi.

verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, mãsu ɗã'ã ga Allah tabbas suna cikin ni'ima.

verses.english: On adorned couches, observing.
verses.hausa: A kan karagu, suna ta kallo.

verses.english: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
verses.hausa: Kana sani a cikin huskõkinsu, akwai kwarjinin ni'ima.

verses.english: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
verses.hausa: Ana shãyar da sũ daga wata giya wadda aka yunƙe a kan rufinta.

verses.arabic: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
verses.english: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
verses.hausa: ¡arshen kurɓinta miski ne. To, a cikin wannan, mãsu gwagwarmaya su yi ta gwagwarmayar nẽma.

verses.english: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
verses.hausa: Kuma abin da ake gauraya ta da shi, daga tasnĩm yake.

verses.english: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
verses.hausa: (Wato) wani marmaro ne wanda muƙarrabai ke sha daga gare shi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, waɗanda suka kãfirta sun kasance (a dũniya) suna yi wa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni dãriya.

verses.english: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sun shuɗe su sai su dinga yin zunɗe.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
verses.english: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan suka jũya zuwa ga iyãlansu, sai su tafi suna kãkãci.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.english: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sun gan su sai su ce: "Lalle waɗannan ɓatattu ne."

verses.english: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
verses.hausa: Alhãli kuwa, ba a aike su ba dõmin su zama mãsu tsaro a kansu.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.english: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
verses.hausa: To, yau fa (a Lãhira] waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, sũ ke yi wa kãfirai dãriya.

verses.english: On adorned couches, observing.
verses.hausa: A kan karagu, suna ta kallo.

verses.arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
verses.hausa: Shin an sãka ma kãfirai abin da suka kasance suna aikatawa?
